title: Font blogs - any recommendations?

comments.content: On [InDesign Secrets](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210105255/http:/indesignsecrets.com/favorite-typography-sites.php), there’s a list of some good sites. Check out my comment (Reed Reibstein, 2nd comment down); I listed most of the font blogs I frequent.
[ilovetypography.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210105255/http:/ilovetypography.com/) doesn’t seem to be there on that list.

What a list from Mr. Hunt! We’ll be occupied for hours.  
Please try [my blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210105255/http:/textwrap.wordpress.com/) if you get the opportunity.
i♥t is pretty new - but the list is a wiki - so you can add to it as you like.

Thanks sii, hadn’t known that.
